name: hapi-sol
description: A simpler session based auth plugin for Hapi
author: Yoni Jah <yoni.jah@non.co.il>

scripts.cov: npm run lib-cov &&  ENVIRONMENT=test ISTANBUL_REPORTERS=html,text-summary  COVER=SOL ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --timeout=20000 --reporter mocha-istanbul
scripts.lib-cov: npm run clean && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js instrument --output lib-cov --no-compact --variable global.__coverage__ lib
